alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:33PM MST until July 29 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PIMA COUNTY... At 531 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Miguel, or 16 miles southeast of Sells, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Topawa, San Miguel, Vamori, Cowlic, Choulic, Newfield, Coldfield, Fresnal Canyon, Hashan Chuchg, South Komelik and Itak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
